timeline.bodyText: moved to utils because I'm reusing it for RW-3211

timeline.bodyText: Opt nit: any reason not to just use 0 instead of 0.0 here?
timeline.author: dolbeew

replies.bodyText: to be explicit that it's a double rather than an int.  Or maybe that is not an appropriate distinction for JS?
replies.author: jmthibault79
